scripts.prebuild: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter api prisma generate
scripts.ensure:web: pnpm --filter web install --frozen-lockfile || pnpm --filter web install
scripts.collect:static: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -r packages/web/dist/* dist/ && shx mkdir -p dist/api && shx cp -r packages/api/dist/* dist/api/ && shx mkdir -p dist/node_modules/shared/dist && shx cp -r packages/shared/dist/* dist/node_modules/shared/dist/ && shx cp packages/shared/package.json dist/node_modules/shared/ && echo 'Contents of dist directory:' && shx ls -A dist/
scripts.build:all: pnpm build && pnpm ensure:web && pnpm build:web && pnpm collect:static && echo 'Build completed, checking for dist/index.html:' && shx ls -A dist/index.html
